name: UnmodifiableMultiValuedMapTest
description: Tests for the UnmodifiableMultiValuedMap class, focusing on its unmodifiable behavior and exceptions thrown for modification attempts.

test_cases.name: testAddException
test_cases.description: Tests that an UnsupportedOperationException is thrown when attempting to add an element to an unmodifiable map.

test_cases.name: testClearException
test_cases.description: Tests that an UnsupportedOperationException is thrown when attempting to clear an unmodifiable map.

test_cases.name: testDecorateFactory
test_cases.description: Tests that the decorate factory method returns the same map instance.

test_cases.name: testDecoratorFactoryNullMap
test_cases.description: Tests that a NullPointerException is thrown when attempting to decorate a null map.

test_cases.name: testPutAllException
test_cases.description: Tests that an UnsupportedOperationException is thrown when attempting to use putAll methods on an unmodifiable map.

test_cases.name: testRemoveException
test_cases.description: Tests that an UnsupportedOperationException is thrown when attempting to remove an element from an unmodifiable map.

test_cases.name: testRemoveMappingException
test_cases.description: Tests that an UnsupportedOperationException is thrown when attempting to remove a mapping from an unmodifiable map.

test_cases.name: testUnmodifiable
test_cases.description: Tests that the created maps are instances of Unmodifiable.

test_cases.name: testUnmodifiableAsMap
test_cases.description: Tests that the asMap view of the unmodifiable map throws UnsupportedOperationException for modification attempts.

test_cases.name: testUnmodifiableEntries
test_cases.description: Tests that the entries collection of the unmodifiable map throws UnsupportedOperationException for modification attempts.

test_cases.name: testUnmodifiableKeys
test_cases.description: Tests that the keys collection of the unmodifiable map throws UnsupportedOperationException for modification attempts.

test_cases.name: testUnmodifiableKeySet
test_cases.description: Tests that the keySet of the unmodifiable map throws UnsupportedOperationException for modification attempts.

test_cases.name: testUnmodifiableMapIterator
test_cases.description: Tests that the mapIterator of the unmodifiable map throws UnsupportedOperationException for modification attempts.

test_cases.name: testUnmodifiableValues
test_cases.description: Tests that the values collection of the unmodifiable map throws UnsupportedOperationException for modification attempts.
